broadsoft.name: broadsoft

revisions.description: Added new counters for XSI-Events feature

broadsoft.contactinfo: Broadsoft, Inc 220 Perry Parkway Gaithersburg, MD 20877 301-977-9440
broadsoft.description: The BW-BroadworksXtendedServicesPlatform.mib is introduces to capture the performance measurements for the BroadWorks Xtended Services Platform.

bwXspCommonCommStatsTable.name: bwXspCommonCommStatsTable
bwXspCommonCommStatsTable.description: This table contains counters for BCCT for the XSP process.

bwXspCommonCommStatsEntry.name: bwXspCommonCommStatsEntry
bwXspCommonCommStatsEntry.description: Definition of the entries for bwOCSCommonCommStatsTable.

bwXspCommonCommStatsIndex.name: bwXspCommonCommStatsIndex
bwXspCommonCommStatsIndex.description: This integer represents an index in table bwXspCommonCommStatsTable. The index represents a connection for a specific Host-Interfacece-Protocol combination.

bwXspCommonCommHost.name: bwXspCommonCommHost
bwXspCommonCommHost.description: The address of a host connected to the BroadWorks Common Communication Protocol.

bwXspCommonCommInterface.name: bwXspCommonCommInterface
bwXspCommonCommInterface.description: The IP address of a local interface that a protocol is bound to.

bwXspCommonCommProtocol.name: bwXspCommonCommProtocol
bwXspCommonCommProtocol.description: The name of a BroadWorks Common Communication Protocol client protocol, e.g. OCI.

bwXspCommonCommAcceptedOutboundConnectio.name: bwXspCommonCommAcceptedOutboundConnections
bwXspCommonCommAcceptedOutboundConnectio.description: This counter is incremented whenever a client in this process connects to the framework to a remote host, using the interface and protocol.

bwXspCommonCommAcceptedInboundConnection.name: bwXspCommonCommAcceptedInboundConnections
bwXspCommonCommAcceptedInboundConnection.description: This counter is incremented whenever a client in this process connects to the framework from a remote host, using the interface and protocol.

bwXspCommonCommRejectedOutboundConnectio.name: bwXspCommonCommRejectedOutboundConnections
bwXspCommonCommRejectedOutboundConnectio.description: This counter is incremented whenever a client connection request going from this process to a remote host and going through this interface has been rejected for a particular protocol.

bwXspCommonCommRejectedInboundConnection.name: bwXspCommonCommRejectedInboundConnections
bwXspCommonCommRejectedInboundConnection.description: This counter is incremented whenever a client connection request coming to this host and going through this interface has been rejected by the framework for a particular protocol.

bwXspCommonCommOutputMessagesProcessed.name: bwXspCommonCommOutputMessagesProcessed
bwXspCommonCommOutputMessagesProcessed.description: This counter is incremented whenever a message has been sent and processed for this host, interface and protocol.

bwXspCommonCommInputMessagesProcessed.name: bwXspCommonCommInputMessagesProcessed
bwXspCommonCommInputMessagesProcessed.description: This counter is incremented whenever a message has been received and processed for this host, interface and protocol.

bwXspCommonCommOutputCommunicationErrors.name: bwXspCommonCommOutputCommunicationErrors
bwXspCommonCommOutputCommunicationErrors.description: This counter is incremented whenever a message could not be read because the TCP stack returned an error.

bwXspCommonCommInputCommunicationErrors.name: bwXspCommonCommInputCommunicationErrors
bwXspCommonCommInputCommunicationErrors.description: This counter is incremented whenever a message has been sent and processed for this host, interface and protocol.

bwXspAuthenticationAttempts.name: bwXspAuthenticationAttempts
bwXspAuthenticationAttempts.description: This counter is incremented when the XSP sends an authentication message to the Authentication Server, e.g. BroadWorks PS.

bwXspAuthenticationFailed.name: bwXspAuthenticationFailed
bwXspAuthenticationFailed.description: This counter is incremented when the XSP receives an authentication failure response from the Authentication Server, e.g. BroadWorks PS.

bwXspOCIRequests.name: bwXspOCIRequests
bwXspOCIRequests.description: The number of OCI request messages sent to the BroadWorks PS.

bwXspOCIResponses.name: bwXspOCIResponses
bwXspOCIResponses.description: The number of request response to OCI messages received from the BroadWorks PS.

bwXspOCIUnauthorizedMessage.name: bwXspOCIUnauthorizedMessage
bwXspOCIUnauthorizedMessage.description: The number of error response due to unauthorized session received from the BroadWorks PS.

bwXspOCICRequests.name: bwXspOCICRequests
bwXspOCICRequests.description: The number of OCI-C request messages sent to the BroadWorks XS.

bwXspOCICResponses.name: bwXspOCICResponses
bwXspOCICResponses.description: The number of request response to OCI-C messages received from the BroadWorks XS.

bwXspOCICMessagesReceived.name: bwXspOCICMessagesReceived
bwXspOCICMessagesReceived.description: This counter is incremented when a message from an XS is received.

bwXspOCICMessagesRejected.name: bwXspOCICMessagesRejected
bwXspOCICMessagesRejected.description: This counter is incremented when a message from an XS is rejected before it reaches the web application.

bwXspOCICMessagesDelivered.name: bwXspOCICMessagesDelivered
bwXspOCICMessagesDelivered.description: This counter is incremented when a message from an XS is delivered to the web application.

bwXspOCICMessagesReplied.name: bwXspOCICMessagesReplied
bwXspOCICMessagesReplied.description: This counter is incremented when a reply from an web application is delivered to the XS.

bwXspNsLocAPIAttempts.name: bwXspNsLocAPIAttempts
bwXspNsLocAPIAttempts.description: This counter is incremented when the XSP sends a location API request to a Network Server.

bwXspNsLocAPIResponseFailed.name: bwXspNsLocAPIResponseFailed
bwXspNsLocAPIResponseFailed.description: This counter is incremented when the XSP receives a failed location API response from the Network Server.

bwXspNsASDiscoveryAttempts.name: bwXspNsASDiscoveryAttempts
bwXspNsASDiscoveryAttempts.description: This counter is incremented when the Xsp sends a PortalAPI request to a Network Server.

bwXspNsASDiscoveryAttemptsFailed.name: bwXspNsASDiscoveryAttemptsFailed
bwXspNsASDiscoveryAttemptsFailed.description: This counter is incremented when the Xsp is unable to receive a successful PortalAPI request from the Network Server.

bwXspBcctGroup.name: bwXspBcctGroup
bwXspBcctGroup.description: This group defines the Xsp statistics for the BCCT protocol to the BroadWorks Application.

bwXspAuthGroup.name: bwXspAuthGroup
bwXspAuthGroup.description: This group defines the XSP statistics for the auth component.

bwXspOciGroup.name: bwXspOciGroup
bwXspOciGroup.description: This group defines the Xsp statistics for the OCI protocol to the BroadWorks Application.

bwXspNsLocAPIGroup.name: bwXspNsLocAPIGroup
bwXspNsLocAPIGroup.description: This group defines the Xsp statistics for the NS Location API protocol to the BroadWorks Network Server.

bwXspNsPortalAPIGroup.name: bwXspNsPortalAPIGroup
bwXspNsPortalAPIGroup.description: This group defines the Xsp statistics for the NS Portal API protocol to the BroadWorks Network Server.

bwXspBasicCompliance.name: bwXspBasicCompliance
bwXspBasicCompliance.description: BroadWorks Xtended Services Platform MIB compliance
